name: Cyberpunk Infinity: Dystopian Mining Sci-Fi Tale
name_original: Cyberpunk Infinity: Dystopian Mining Sci-Fi Tale
description:
Cyberpunk Clicker: Fiction Dystopian Crypto Comics is a unique gamebook, that features advanced science and technology in an urban, dystopian future. It is a great combination of a cryptocurrency mining guide and a comic book with unpredictable stories and endings.

Apart from being a science fiction dystopian gamebook, it is a new fantasy clicker: you move from one level to another one by clicking on objects as well as connecting wires and cables together.

All the players will find themselves in a city full of cyber fighters and epic fantasy locations. On one side you have powerful security forces, and on the other - the dark underworld of illegal trade and gangs. To survive you need to learn how to mine bitcoins (btc), ethereum (eth) and other cryptocurrencies. While progressing, you will have a unique opportunity to read our hand-drawn comics with different characters and real heroes of the future.

Main Features:
- A unique cyberpunk world full of fighters, heroes and hunters;
- Immerse into our purple tint dystopian game and enjoy reading the comics;
- А new fantasy clicker: click on the right objects and connect wires together;
- Learn how to mine cryptocurrency with our bitcoin guide;
- Stunning graphics and characters;
- Upgrade the suits, change locations and surroundings;
- Become the best blade runner.
